content: Thanks for creating this stream @Kevin Shekleton. I'm putting together a Google Doc to start building out the objectives and possible agenda items and will post a link to it here shortly.
Sounds great & I'm looking forward to helping with this.
Here is the link to the Google Document we can use to begin brainstorming and planning: https://docs.google.com/document/d/17fzcRqNFnb8csKIp0azzdrx_HwNNhgjkevUQ8COoi9o/edit#

I've moved over from the brainstorming document to this one to start nailing down the specifics of the conference: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1P9zQfBSwGacdgdY17GmxEyk-JY_q0_3tao04I9ca-Gg/edit#. Feel free to edit directly session ideas for now. I will begin to layout a schedule and fill in details as the become available.
Seeking suggestions for sessions and individuals/organizations that wish to present. Please reach out to me and we can discuss. Rick@iSalusSolutions.com
Thanks, Rick. I owe you a reply on your email that you sent yesterday too

@Rick Freeman - Out of curiosity, have you been working with anyone else on this? If so, who? I'm just curious given our last conversation was last month and I didn't realize that you would be scheduling the conf so soon

@Kevin Shekleton Yes, besides Josh and myself, we've discussed this with Epic, Allscripts, HUMC, and Intermountain Healthcare as well as a number of members of the HSPC and a handful of application developers. I've recently reached out to Grahame and athenahealth too but are still scheduling those meetings.
